entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow and local blowing snow beginning after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
